video_prompt: Tulip field pulsates with soft orange light under a darkening sky. Individual tulips subtly glow, varying in intensity. The background blurs and unblurs, highlighting different areas of the glowing field. The sky shifts from deep indigo to faint blue, hinting at the passage from dusk to night.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Field of glowing orange tulips at eye-level, dark and moody sky. Dominant colors: vibrant orange and dark green. Sharp focus on a glowing, almost yellow-orange foreground tulip with visible veins. Blurred background of luminous orange tulips. Subtle blue hint in the dark twilight sky. Soft, diffused lighting, magical, tranquil, serene, mystical atmosphere.
refined_video_prompt: A tulip field pulses with soft orange light. Individual blooms subtly ebb and flow in their luminous intensity. The depth of field dynamically shifts, drawing focus across different segments of the glowing field. Overhead, the sky darkens and transitions from deep indigo to faint blue, signifying dusk yielding to night.
